deliver_gold_ingot.goal: Follow a strict tool progression (wood -> stone -> iron) to mine gold ore, smelt it into at least 1 gold ingot, then deliver the gold ingot to the nearest player.
instructions: PHASE 1 — WOOD + CRAFTING TABLE (do not search for stone/iron/gold yet)
1. Collect at least 8 logs from nearby trees.
2. Craft the logs into wooden planks.
3. Craft a crafting table and place it on the ground near your working area.
PHASE 2 — WOODEN PICKAXE -> COBBLESTONE (do not search for iron/gold yet)
4. Using the crafting table, craft a wooden pickaxe.
5. Mine stone with the wooden pickaxe until you have at least 16 cobblestone total (you will use this for tools + a furnace).
PHASE 3 — STONE PICKAXE -> IRON ORE (do not search for gold yet)
6. Using the crafting table, craft a stone pickaxe (keep the remaining cobblestone).
7. Locate a cave or dig down safely to find iron ore.
8. Mine iron ore with the stone pickaxe until you collect at least 3 raw iron.
PHASE 4 — FURNACE + FUEL -> IRON PICKAXE
9. Using the crafting table, craft a furnace using 8 cobblestone (do not use all cobblestone; keep leftovers if possible).
10. Collect fuel (at least 8 pieces of coal OR make charcoal by smelting logs).
11. Smelt raw iron in the furnace until you have at least 3 iron ingots.
12. Using the crafting table, craft an iron pickaxe.
PHASE 5 — IRON PICKAXE -> GOLD ORE -> GOLD INGOT
13. Go deeper underground (gold commonly appears below Y=32).
14. Mine gold ore with the iron pickaxe until you collect at least 1 raw gold.
15. Smelt raw gold in the furnace until you have at least 1 gold ingot.
PHASE 6 — DELIVER
16. Locate the nearest player.
17. Walk to the player and drop the gold ingot in front of them.
